Item1.name: Sorcerer's Staff
Item1.description: A powerful staff wielded by wizards and sorcerers, channeling magical energies.

Item2.name: Knight's Broadsword
Item2.description: A sturdy broadsword, the weapon of choice for noble knights in epic battles.

Item3.name: Enchanted Bow of Elvenkind
Item3.description: A finely crafted bow, imbued with elven magic for unparalleled accuracy and power.

Item4.name: Dwarven War Axe
Item4.description: A stout and deadly war axe forged by skilled dwarven blacksmiths for close-quarters combat.

Item5.name: Rogue's Dagger
Item5.description: A sleek dagger, perfect for stealthy maneuvers and swift, silent strikes.
